Welcome:
Welcome to "Drawing game"! 
You can draw one of the figures by entering their numbers. 
You can also end your game by entering "x".
TheFiguresAre:
The figures are:
 
1 - simple dot 
2 - horizontal line 
3 - vertical line 
4 - circle
ChooseYourFigure: Choose your figure or enter "x" to quit.
ThankYouForPlaying:
Thank you for playing!
Press any button to quit.
ItIsNotANumber: It is not a number. Let's try again
